readable.title: 2248487950_c62d0c81a9
readable.content: A man and a woman wait to cross a street . a man talks on his cellphone and another man rides a wheelchair . A woman crosses the street near a man , who is on his cellphone . A woman in a coat and a man in a tracksuit talking on a phone cross the street . A woman tries to cross the road before a man on a red scooter .
